movies.title: jurassic park
movies.description: a select group chosen to tour an island theme park populated by dinosaurs created from prehistoric DNA.

movies.title: the imitation game
movies.description: In 1939, newly created British intelligence agency MI6 recruits Cambridge mathematics alumnus Alan Turing to crack Nazi codes.

movies.title: avengers
movies.description: Nick Fury, director of SHIELD, initiates a superhero recruitment effort to defeat the unprecedented threat to Earth.

movies.title: arrival
movies.description: Linguistics professor Louise Banks leads an elite team of investigators when gigantic spaceships touch down in 12 locations around the world.

celebrities.title: chris evans
celebrities.description: an American actor who was known for his charismatic performances in superhero movies

celebrities.title: benedict cumberbatch
celebrities.description: an acclaimed British motion-picture, theater, and television actor known for his portrayals of intelligent.

celebrities.title: daniel craig
celebrities.description: an English actor known for his restrained gravitas and ruggedly handsome features.

celebrities.title: lana del rey
celebrities.description: an American singer-songwriter known for pairing glamorously morose musical themes with classic Americana and a nostalgic, cinematic visual style.

countries.title: sweden
countries.description: It is the largest Nordic country and the fifth-largest country in Europe.

countries.title: russia
countries.description: It is a country spanning Eastern Europe and North Asia. It is the largest country in the world by area.

countries.title: costa rica
countries.description: it is a country in the Central American region of North America.

countries.title: austria
countries.description: it is a country in Central Europe, lying in the Eastern Alps. It is a federation of nine states.

tvshows.title: supernatural
tvshows.description: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods.

tvshows.title: primeval
tvshows.description: When strange anomalies start to appear all over England, Professor Cutter and his team must track down and capture all sorts of dangerous prehistoric creatures.

tvshows.title: the last kingdom
tvshows.description: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred--born a Saxon but raised by Vikings--seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

tvshows.title: house of dragon
tvshows.description: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years.

songs.title: god gave me you
songs.description: In 2011, American country music singer Blake Shelton recorded the song on his 2011 album Red River Blue.

songs.title: skyfall
songs.description: It is the theme song to the 2012 film of the same name, performed by English singer-songwriter Adele.

songs.title: smooth criminal
songs.description: It's a song by the American pop singer Michael Jackson, released on November 14, 1988, from his seventh studio album, Bad (1987).

animals.title: dolphins
animals.description: an aquatic mammal in the clade Odontoceti (toothed whale).

animals.title: penguin
animals.description: Penguins are flightless aquatic birds that live almost exclusively in the Southern Hemisphere

animals.title: giraffe
animals.description: It is the tallest living terrestrial animal and the largest ruminant on Earth

animals.title: hazard
animals.description: It is a song written, produced, and performed by American singer-songwriter Richard Marx.
